pr_title: limit the available options for voluntary-exit.

timeline.message:
limit the available options for voluntary-exit.

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>

timeline.bodyText:
This isn't enough.  We also need the options to specify external signers:

validators-external-signer-public-keys
--validators-external-signer-url
--validators-external-signer-timeout
timeline.author: ajsutton

+import java.util.ArrayList;

+import picocli.CommandLine;
+import tech.pegasys.teku.config.TekuConfiguration;
+
+public class ValidatorKeysOptions {
+
+  @CommandLine.Option(
+      names = {"--validator-keys"},
+      paramLabel = "<KEY_DIR>:<PASS_DIR> | <KEY_FILE>:<PASS_FILE>",
+      description =
+          "<KEY_DIR>:<PASS_DIR> will find <KEY_DIR>/**.json, and expect to find <PASS_DIR>/**.txt.\n"
+              + "<KEY_FILE>:<PASS_FILE> will expect that the file <KEY_FILE> exists, "
+              + "and the file containing the password for it is <PASS_FILE>.\n"
+              + "The path separator is operating system dependent, and should be ';' in windows rather than ':'.",
+      split = ",",
+      arity = "1..*")
+  private List<String> validatorKeys = new ArrayList<>();

replies.bodyText: May as well move the old validators-key-files and validators-key-password-files options into here too just for consistency.  They're hidden and will be removed soon but its tidier to keep all the key loading options in one place.
replies.author: ajsutton

timeline.bodyText: Probably worth making SlashingProtector an interface so we can just supply a FORBID_ALL option here (validator exit shouldn't ask to sign any attestations or blocks so if it does, slashing protector should reject the request)
timeline.author: ajsutton

timeline.message:
move the external-signer flags so they can be used by the voluntary exit command.

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>

add confirmation to the workflow, and a 'loading configuration' option because it can be slow if many validators are being loaded.

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>

change SlashingProtector to be an interface, and provide a protector that rejects all requests.

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>
